headline: Former TikTok CEO Mayer on US Deal: 'It's About Time'
summary: Kevin Mayer, Candle Media co-CEO and former TikTok CEO, reacts to TikTok's deal to avoid a nationwide ban in the US. Speaking on "Bloomberg The Close," Mayer also discusses the future of the app, who he thinks should lead Walt Disney Co. and the Warner Bros. Discovery saga.

headline: Disney Expects a New CEO in ‘Early 2026.’ Why It’s a Make-or-Break Call for the Stock.
summary: Disney  remains on course to appoint a new CEO early this year.  It’s a challenging job, with one of the new boss’s top priorities likely to be ending a decade-long stagnant run for the House of Mouse’s shares.  Chairman of the board James Gorman said in a letter to shareholders late Thursday that Disney expects “to announce the appointment of the Company’s next CEO in early 2026.”

raw.headline: Disney Expects a New CEO in ‘Early 2026.’ Why It’s a Make-or-Break Call for the Stock.
